Chapter Next

class gstTriPoly : public gstTriPolyBase

Triangular Poly Class. Every polygon is defined by its 3 vertices in the order specified by the parent gstTriPolyMeshBase class's getVertexOrder method. The parent gstTriPolyMeshBase is specified through the constructor.

From header file: gstTriPoly.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstTriPolyCreates Triangle defined by the 3 vertices v1, v2, and v3.
~gstTriPoly
Functions
beginModify Called when 'this' gstTriPoly object is going to be modified.
cloneTriPoly Virtual method to copy this gstTriPoly object and return gstTriPoly pointer to newly cloned object.
convertToBarycentricCoord Given a 3D point coplaner with this triangle, the corresponding barycentric coordinate is returned.
convertToCartesianCoord Convert UV coordinate to 3D point.
convertToUVCoord Converts 3D point coplaner with triangle to UV coordinates of triangle.
e1 Returns pointer to edge1 (v1->v2).
e2 Returns pointer to edge2 (v2->v3).
e3 Returns pointer to edge3 (v3->v1).
endModify Called when 'this' gstTriPoly object is done being modified.
getE1 Returns pointer to edge1 (v1->v2).
getE2 Returns pointer to edge2 (v2->v3).
getE3 Returns pointer to edge3 (v3->v1).
getKey Returns unique id of this object.
getPoly Returns pointer to gstTriPoly cooresponding to correct index.
getPropertyContainer Returns pointer to gstPolyPropertyContainer class storing polygonal property information (ie.
getTriPolyMesh Returns pointer to parent gstTriPolyMesh object.
getV1 Returns pointer to v1.
getV2 Returns pointer to v2.
getV3 Returns pointer to v3.
inside Returns TRUE if pt is coplaner to this triangle and is within boundary of triangle.
intersectCoplanar_LS_PE LineSeg is a line segment co-planer to this gstTriPoly face.
modify Called when 'this' gstTriPoly object has been modified.
getClassTypeId Static: get type id of this class.
staticIsOfType Return TRUE if class is of the given type or is derived from that type.
Virtual Functions
cloneVirtual method to copy this object and return base class pointer to newly copied object.
getBoundingBoxReturns gstBoundingBox just enclosing this triangle.
getTypeIdVirtual form of getClassTypeId.
interpolateNormalReturns normal vector of Triangle.
intersectFirstInOut_LS_PIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstIn_LS_PIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectFirstOut_LS_PIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersect_BCIntersects gstTriPoly with gstBoundingCube object and returns gstObjectObjectIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersect_BSIntersects gstTriPoly with gstBoundingCube object and returns gstObjectObjectIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
isOfTypeVirtual form of staticIsOfType.
